actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to mutual action by the United States and Canada to protect and enhance the quality of air resources along their mutual border so as to promote the public health and welfare.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of State: (1) make every effort to negotiate an agreement with Canada to preserve out mutual airshed, protect air resources, and maintain air quality; and (2) take whatever diplomatic actions necessary to reduce or eliminate any undesirable impact on both countries resulting from air pollution from any source.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to mutual action by the United States and Canada to protect and enhance the quality of air resources along their mutual border so as to promote the public health and welfare.
